scripts.prettier: prettier --write '{server,__{tests,mocks}__}/**/*.js' && cd ui/ && npm run prettier
scripts.clean: rm -rf coverage && cd ui/ && npm run clean
scripts.clobber: rm -rf coverage node_modules && cd ui/ && npm run clobber
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd ui/ && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
